name: Mailwarm
headline: Prevents marketing emails from landing in spam.
description:
Mailwarm is a marketing software which takes care of your email deliverability so your emails reach your recipients' inboxes.
Mailwarm allows you to :
- get a perfect email activity 
- raise your sender reputation
- keep your email deliverability high

founders.name: Amine Benjelloun, Founder

raw_markdown='[![mailwarm_icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5de7d2cf65d48a4756e18efd_picto_mailwarm.svg)![mailwarm-logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5de9618249103c7e09945af3_logo_mailwarm.svg)](https://www.mailwarm.com/<https:/mailwarm.com>)[How it works](https://www.mailwarm.com/<#how-it-works>)[FAQ](https://www.mailwarm.com/</pricing#faq>)[Pricing](https://www.mailwarm.com/</pricing>)[Blog](https://www.mailwarm.com/</blog>)[Login](https://www.mailwarm.com/<https:/app.mailwarm.com/login>)[Sign up](https://www.mailwarm.com/<https:/app.mailwarm.com/register>)
# Don't land in spam anymore.
## Mailwarm raises your sender reputation by positively interacting with your emails, every day.
[Reach Inbox](https://www.mailwarm.com/</pricing>)
So much time to craft your emails‚Ä¶ only to land in spam.
![avoid-spam-folder](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5de905e51db32a3fd6d7637c_emailfirst-LOOP.svg)
Funded by Y Combinator
# Email warm-up that works
![email-warm-up](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5e2872ae1cf8b75601b0c871_picto-sent.svg)
### Get a perfect email activity
Mailwarm helps you reach the required email activity from a quantitative and qualitative perspective to land in inbox.
![email-warm-up](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5e2872ad1cf8b78066b0c86e_picto-open.svg)
### Raise your sender reputation
Mailwarm activity has a positive impact on your email, domain and IP reputation so your global sender reputation gets better.
![email-warm-up](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5e2872adfb7cee063e52c422_picto-no-spam.svg)
### Keep your deliverability high
By running Mailwarm on a daily basis, this will balance your own activity and keep your email deliverability high.
# Easy 2 min setup
![how-to-warmup-step1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5de912d0bbf4dac017269cb2_signup.svg)
### 1. Sign up now
![how-to-warmup-step2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5de912fd3a43379a0ee923f4_settings.svg)
### 2. Link your email account
![how-to-warmup-step3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5de91325bbf4da0264269edc_start.svg)
### 3. Start the warm-up
[**Start improving deliverability**](https://www.mailwarm.com/</pricing>)
Ensure every email reaches the inbox
What our customers are saying
 _"Using it almost for 2 months, and grow my open rate more than 30%. Must have for everyone, who runs cold outreach campaigns."_
Max Markarenko
Founder & CEO at Docsify.net
 _" I ran a deliverability test on the domain you guys are warming up and the results are looking brilliant! Big fan of you guys' service :) "_
Austin Monson
Growth Strategy at AskWonder.com
 _" So far deliverability to Office365/exchange has improved for the mailbox we're testing with Mailwarm."_
Anton van Rhyn
Founder at Wavo.co
# How does it work ?
Mailwarm acts like thousands of perfect leads interacting with your emails.This parallel activity sends a positive signal to email providers and their spam filters.
![warm-up-monitoring](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5de90c923a4337735ee8ed03_inbox_loop_show.svg)
## Mailwarm emails
Your **email account** automatically sends dozens of emails to +1000 Mailwarm's accounts, and **get replies**. Mailwarm daily interactions are sent according to the schedule you set.
## Perfect actions
Your emails sent to Mailwarm will get **out of the spam folder** , **opened** , **marked as important** , and get a **reply**. These great interactions have a positive impact on your sender reputation.
![email-account-reputation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5de90e4b816040f0b39de77e_important_loop.svg)
![warm-up-monitoring](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5de90d5781604078b69de194_dashboard_loop.svg)
## Dashboard monitoring
Track and control Mailwarm on a dashboard. Get insights on your daily activity.Adjust Mailwarm intensity or just press pause, when needed.
[![mailwarm-white-logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5de7b9f425af6967ea6b00a5/5de961828c8f9c1bdaf60b06_logo_white_mailwarm.svg)](https://www.mailwarm.com/<#>)
##### Navigation
  * [How it works](https://www.mailwarm.com/<https:/www.mailwarm.com/#how-it-works>)
  * [FAQ](https://www.mailwarm.com/</pricing#faq>)

  * [Blog](https://www.mailwarm.com/</blog>)

##### Contact
  * [Contact page](https://www.mailwarm.com/</contact>)

  * Press
  * Partnership
  * [Affiliates](https://www.mailwarm.com/</affiliates>)

  * [Terms of use](https://www.mailwarm.com/</terms>)

generated_description:
**Mailwarm: Keeping Your Emails Out of the Spam Folder**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Summer 2020 batch, Mailwarm is a Paris-based startup on a mission to enhance email deliverability. Their job? Ensuring that the emails you labor over don‚Äôt just vanish into spam oblivion. With a two-person team, they've streamlined the complexities of email marketing into a user-friendly SaaS platform focusing on raising sender reputation and maintaining high deliverability rates.

### What Mailwarm Offers
Mailwarm essentially acts like a digital warm-up for your email account. Here‚Äôs how it works:
- **Perfect Email Activity**: Mailwarm boosts your email activity, ensuring that it meets both quantitative and qualitative thresholds required for landing in inboxes.
- **Sender Reputation**: By interacting positively with your emails, it enhances your email, domain, and IP reputation ‚Äî key players in the email ecosystem.
- **High Deliverability**: Consistent daily operation keeps your email deliverability at optimal levels, reducing the chance of your emails being marked as spam.

### How It Works
The cleverness of Mailwarm lies in its unique operation. The platform mimics legitimate user interactions: your email account sends out a bunch of emails to over a thousand Mailwarm accounts, generating replies and engagement. Your emails get opened, marked as important, and even replied to, all serving as positive signals to email providers‚Äô spam filters.

### Set-Up Made Easy
Getting started is a breeze. In three simple steps:
1. **Sign Up**.
2. **Link Your Email Account**.
3. **Start the Warm-Up**.

In just two minutes, you can start improving your email deliverability, ensuring that every crafted message reaches its intended inbox.

### Why Choose Mailwarm?
The testimonials speak volumes. Users report significant improvements in open rates and overall deliverability, especially for cold outreach campaigns. If you‚Äôre tired of watching your carefully written emails slip into the abyss of spam, giving Mailwarm a go might just be the solution you need.

For anyone running email campaigns ‚Äî especially in B2B ‚Äî Mailwarm is a game changer. You can find out more and sign up for their services on [Mailwarm's website](https://www.mailwarm.com). 

So if improving your email deliverability is on your agenda, why not give it a shot? After all, every email deserves an audience.
